pull.title: refactor: Avoid duplicate map lookup in ScriptToAsmStr
pull.body: Simple change that avoids a duplicate (unnecessary) `mapSigHashTypes` lookup.

events.body:
utACK ad8cfbf3f113fa07b07e445ceb69c790c7e732a4
nit: would prefer naming the iterator 'it' over 'i', as the latter mostly implies an (integer) index

Code review ACK ad8cfbf3f113fa07b07e445ceb69c790c7e732a4
I think this is slightly better code, not so much because it avoids duplication, but because it avoids an error prone "blind" `mapSigHashTypes.find(chSigHashType)->`.

> nit: would prefer naming the iterator 'it' over 'i', as the latter mostly implies an (integer) index

agree

Code review ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19852/commits/ad8cfbf3f113fa07b07e445ceb69c790c7e732a4

nit: Third for `it` over `i`.
